member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ScanParamsAPI.Feedback
member.summary: Returns a FeedbackListPropertyInfo object. This object provides a list of feedback types that can be modified.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ScanParamsAPI.Text
member.summary: String that returns "Parameters".

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ScanParamsAPI.FeedbackPropertyInfo.BeepFrequency
member.summary: Not Support in XM

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ScanParamsAPI.FeedbackPropertyInfo.BeepTime
member.summary: Not Support in XM

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ScanParamsAPI.FeedbackPropertyInfo.LedTime
member.summary: An integer that specifies the amount of time to light the decode LED in milliseconds (Range 0-5000).

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ScanParamsAPI.FeedbackPropertyInfo.Text
member.summary: String that returns "Feedback"

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ScanParamsAPI.FeedbackPropertyInfo.WaveFile
member.summary: A string that contains the absolute path to a .WAV file that will be played when the feedback event occurs.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ScanParamsAPI.FeedbackListPropertyInfo.Fail
member.summary: A FeedbackPropertyInfo object will be returned. This object can be used to set parameters about the feedback.

member.summary: A FeedbackPropertyInfo object will be returned. This object can be used to set parameters about the feedback.

member.summary: A FeedbackPropertyInfo object will be returned. This object can be used to set parameters about the feedback.

member.summary: A FeedbackPropertyInfo object will be returned. This object can be used to set parameters about the feedback.

member.summary: A FeedbackPropertyInfo object will be returned. This object can be used to set parameters about the feedback.

member.summary: A FeedbackPropertyInfo object will be returned. This object can be used to set parameters about the feedback.

member.summary: String that returns "Feedback".

member.name: T:PT.Barcode.ReaderDataTypes
member.summary: Data types for the data from barcode scanner.

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.ReaderDataTypes.Binary
member.summary: Currently Not Support

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.ReaderDataTypes.Text
member.summary: The buffer of memory used to access the hardware will hold text.

member.name: T:PT.Barcode.ReaderDataLengths
member.summary: Length of ReaderData memory buffer.

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.ReaderDataLengths.DefaultText
member.summary: Default 55 characters.

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.ReaderDataLengths.MaximumLabel
member.summary: Maximum amount for data.

member.name: T:PT.Barcode.ReaderData
member.summary: ReaderData class encapsulates all the scanned data and meta-data for a read.

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.prvSource
member.summary: Returns the source of the scanned data

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.prvText
member.summary: Returns the scanned data text

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.prvResult
member.summary: The result of the read request

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.prvBufferSize
member.summary: Specifies the memory buffer size allocated by the ReaderData

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.prvHasReader
member.summary: Specifies whether or not the ReaderData has been attached to a Reader object via a Actions.Read method call

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.prvIsAllocated
member.summary: Specifies whether or not a memory buffer has been allocated for the ReaderData

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.prvIsPending
member.summary: Specifies whether or not the ReaderData is currently in a pending read situation

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.prvLength
member.summary: The length of the barcode data

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.prvTimeStamp
member.summary: The time at which the barcode was scanned

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.prvEvent
member.summary: Not used; return either "Scan Complete" or ""

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.prvIsText
member.summary: Specifies whether or not the ReaderData memory buffer is set to text mode

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.prvRawData
member.summary: Returns a byte array with the scanned data

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.prvRequestId
member.summary: Not used; Always return 0

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.prvTypeHex
member.summary: The decoder type of the barcode in hexadecimal format

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.#ctor(PT.Barcode.ReaderDataTypes,PT.Barcode.ReaderDataLengths)
member.summary: ReaderData constructor with enumerated type buffer size.
member.param: A PT.Barcode.ReaderDataTypes member.
Size of the memory buffer in bytes for binary mode, in characters for text mode.

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.#ctor(PT.Barcode.ReaderDataTypes,System.Int32)
member.summary: ReaderData constructor with integer based buffer size.
member.param: A PT.Barcode.ReaderDataTypes member.
Size of the memory buffer in bytes for binary mode, in characters for text mode.

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.Dispose
member.summary: Release all resources used by ReaderData object.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.Source
member.summary: Returns the source of the scanned data.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.Text
member.summary: Returns the scanned data text.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.Result
member.summary: The result of the read request.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.BufferSize
member.summary: Specifies the memory buffer size allocated by the ReaderData.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.HasReader
member.summary: Specifies whether or not the ReaderData has been attached to a Reader object via a Actions.Read method call.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.IsAllocated
member.summary: Specifies whether or not a memory buffer has been allocated for the ReaderData.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.IsPending
member.summary: Specifies whether or not the ReaderData is currently in a pending read situation.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.Length
member.summary: The length of the barcode data.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.TimeStamp
member.summary: The time at which the barcode was scanned.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.Event
member.summary: Not used; return either "Scan Complete" or ""

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.IsText
member.summary: Specifies whether or not the ReaderData memory buffer is set to text mode.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.RawData
member.summary: Returns a byte array with the scanned data.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.RequestId
member.summary: The ID of the read submitted to the barcode scanner.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.ReaderData.TypeHex
member.summary: The Decoder Type of the barcode. (in hexadecimal format)

member.name: T:PT.Barcode.Reader
member.summary: The Barcode.Reader class can be considered the primary class of the Barcode class library. It provides access to actions, information, and parameters.

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.Reader.prvActions
member.summary: Provides access to actions that can be performed on the reader

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.Reader.prvDecoders
member.summary: Provides access to Decoder-specific parameters so that they can be viewed and modified

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.Reader.sText
member.summary: Registry key string

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.Reader.#ctor
member.summary: Reader constructor with settable Barcode.Device

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.Reader.Dispose
member.summary: Frees up all resources used by the reader

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.Reader.GetNextReaderData
member.summary: Gets the next ReaderData object from the read completion queue
member.returns: A PT.Barcode.ReaderData object that has completed.

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.Reader.GetNextStatus
member.summary: Gets the next BarcodeStatus object from the scan status event queue
member.returns: A PT.Barcode.BarcodeStatus object with scan event information.

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.Reader.OnReaderNotify
member.summary: Notify UI thread of read

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.Reader.Restore
member.summary: Restores saved parameters (Not Ready)

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.Reader.Save
member.summary: Save the parameter (Not Ready)

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.Reader.Actions
member.summary: Provides access to actions

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.Reader.Decoders
member.summary: Provides access to Decoder-specific parameters

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.Reader.Text
member.summary: Provides access to Text parameters

member.name: E:PT.Barcode.Reader.ReadNotify
member.summary: Attach to this notification event to be called back when a read completes

member.name: E:PT.Barcode.Reader.StatusNotify
member.summary: Attach to this notification event to be called back when a scan events occurs

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.Reader.Version
member.summary: Provides access to version string

member.name: T:PT.Barcode.Actions
member.summary: Performs actions on the Reader.

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.Actions.#ctor(PT.Barcode.Reader)
member.summary: The Actions contructor

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.Actions.Finalize
member.summary: Allows an Action object to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.Actions.ToggleSoftTrigger
member.summary: Soft trigger the scanner.

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.Actions.CancelRead(PT.Barcode.ReaderData)
member.summary: Cancel any barcode scanning in progress
member.param: A ReaderData object that has a pending read.

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.Actions.Disable
member.summary: Disable the barcode scanner

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.Actions.Dispose
member.summary: Release any resources used by the Actions class

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.Actions.Enable
member.summary: Enable the barcode scanner

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.Actions.Flush
member.summary: Same as CancelRead. Keep it for compatible

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.Actions.NewReaderData
member.summary: Create a new ReaderData object

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.Actions.Read(PT.Barcode.ReaderData)
member.summary: Set the ReaderData object that will contain the scanned data
member.param: The ReaderData object that will contain the scanned data once the read completes.

member.name: T:PT.Barcode.States
member.summary: Different states of the barcode Reader.

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.States.AIMING
member.summary: Scanner beam is on

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.States.FIRST
member.summary: The first item in the States enumeration

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.States.IDLE
member.summary: Scanner is enabled but no reads are pending

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.States.LAST
member.summary: The last item in the States enumeration

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.States.READY
member.summary: Scanner beam is on and it is acquiring data

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.States.STOPPED
member.summary: Scanner is not enabled

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.States.WAITING
member.summary: Scanner has one or more reads pending and is waiting for trigger event

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.States.SCANNING
member.summary: Scanner is scanning barcode data

member.name: T:PT.Barcode.BarcodeStatus
member.summary: The BarcodeStatus class provides access to notification information.

member.name: M:PT.Barcode.BarcodeStatus.#ctor(PT.Barcode.EventTypes,PT.Barcode.States,System.String)
member.summary: The BarcodeStatus constructor
member.param: An EventTypes enumerated type that defines the type of event that has occurred.
A States enumerated type that defines the new state of the Reader.
The state of the Reader in string form.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.BarcodeStatus.State
member.summary: Retrieves the Barcode.Reader event state.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.BarcodeStatus.Text
member.summary: Retrieves the Barcode.Reader state in string form.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.BarcodeStatus.Type
member.summary: Retrieves the Barcode Reader event type.

member.name: T:PT.Barcode.EventTypes
member.summary: Defines the different types of events that can occur for the barcode Reader.

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.EventTypes.ACTIVITY
member.summary: The Scanner is busy/active

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.EventTypes.ERROR
member.summary: An error occurred while trying to wait for an event

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.EventTypes.FIRST
member.summary: The first item in the EventTypes enumeration

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.EventTypes.IMAGE_CAPTURE
member.summary: The Scanner has captured an image and started to download

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.EventTypes.IMAGE_ERROR
member.summary: The Scanner has encountered a fatal error downloading an image

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.EventTypes.LAST
member.summary: The last item in the EventTypes enumeration

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.EventTypes.SEQUENCE_CONTINUE
member.summary: The Scanner has captured another barcode in a concatenation sequence

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.EventTypes.SEQUENCE_ERROR
member.summary: The Scanner has encountered a non-fatal concatenation error

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.EventTypes.SEQUENCE_FAIL
member.summary: The Scanner has encountered a fatal concatenation error

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.EventTypes.SEQUENCE_START
member.summary: The Scanner has captured the first barcode in a concatenation sequence

member.name: F:PT.Barcode.EventTypes.STATE_CHANGE
member.summary: The state of the scanner has changed

member.name: T:PT.Barcode.DecoderParamsAPI
member.summary: The DecoderParamsAPI Class contains decoder parameters that are used by multiple decoder symbologies.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.DecoderParamsAPI.IsSupported
member.summary: Returns whether or not the Decoder is supported by the Reader.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.DecoderParamsAPI.Text
member.summary: The Text property returns the name of the Decoder.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.DecoderParamsAPI.MaximumLength
member.summary: Returns the maximum length of a valid barcode for the decoder.

member.name: P:PT.Barcode.DecoderParamsAPI.MinimumLength
member.summary: Returns the minimum length of a valid barcode for the decoder.
